title: "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to..."
body:
Here's the message I get when opening League.

"We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version."

After hitting OKAY, 

"There was a problem patch LOL, We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher.

After hitting RESTART, goes back to the start...

What can I do to solve this? (tried to change my PC date/hours, didn't work).

replies.body:
If that keeps you stuck in a weird looping of repatching, let's go ahead and just fix *all* of those game files eh?

Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it as admin with the options **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** turned on. Try that and let me know how it goes for ya.
